EmailTemplate.name: Customer Transition to Portal
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace.
Honeywell has made enhancements to your ordering process. More parts are available on your MyAerospace Portal and we have improved the way you can view and track your orders.
We will process this order from your email.
Please log in to MyAerospace Portal to place your future orders. To get started, you can view our online tutorials here.
Honeywell is making these improvements to move your order from placed, to processed, to delivered, faster. The portal gives you immediate confirmation that your order has been placed and it allows you to track its progress from any computer, tablet, or smartphone.
The portal will open a world of convenience, dependability, and speed for your company. Please ensure that starting April 1st, 2017 you are using myaerospace.honeywell.com for all your order management.
Learn more about all MyAerospace Portal updates and view additional details about Order Status.
Thank you. We appreciate your business. Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support
Do you need immediate support? Contact Us
